name: Holey Moley (Jordy Huijgens)
description:
Holey Moley is a top-down adventure game made for the Brackeys Gamejam 2020.1 The goal is to help a lady out, and fill up a hole in her garden.

Please play the game in FULLSCREEN

  • up/down/left/right to walk around
  • Pickups and chats will happen automatically

Made in 1 week . The theme for this jam was: holes.
